Interact_Air-Vent_1.Text: There's a lot of these here.

Interact_Air-Vent_2.Text: Why does this place have so many?

Interact_Air-Vent_3.Text: They must be really serious about clean air.

Interact_Air-Vent_4.Text: At least I know the air is clean.

Interact_Night-Stand.Text: Maybe there's something in one of its drawers...

Interact_Night-Stand_Other.Text: Just like in the room I was in.

Interact_Bed_Begin.Text: It doesn't really look that bad, though.

Interact_Bed_Other.Text: Almost identical to the one in the room I was in.

Introduce_Rosemary-Simon.Text: No way, a place this big? There's gotta be someone here!
See, Simon? I told you there had to be someone else here!
I'm Rosemary, but you can call me Rose if you want.
I'm Simon, as you probably heard. Nice to meet you, too.
How did you get into this room?
Oh, I came through that big wooden door over there.
Did you wake up in some sort of bedroom?
From what I've seen, it seems like some sort of hotel.
If it is a hotel, they'd have a lobby, right?
And hotels usually have the lobby on the ground floor, right?
So if we go downstairs, we should find a lobby, and maybe someone who can tell us where we are!

Presence_Rosemary_Foyer-2L_Introduce.Text: You know, I guess this really is like a hotel!
But why would we have just woken up here?
I don't even remember how I got here, do you?
Well, maybe going downstairs will solve this mystery!

Presence_Simon_Foyer-2L_Introduce.Text: There's something I still don't understand...
Do you remember how we got here?
It was just black; I heard a rumbling noise, and that's when I woke up.
...but let's just head downstairs for now.

Foyer-2L_Leave_Rooms.Text: Oh, you're going to go look around some more?
I think we'll just stay out here. We'll wait for you!

Foyer-2L_Leave_Upstairs.Text: I don't really think we would find anything upstairs.
If this is a hotel, there's probably a lobby downstairs, so let's go down there.

Enter_Foyer-1.Text: Look at that door! It goes to the lobby, look at the sign!

Presence_Rosemary_Foyer-1_Initial.Text: can i getta lorge fires with a kazuixchi

Interact_Lobby_Door_Initial.Text: Alright, let's find out what's going on!
What?
What are you waiting for?
It's locked!
What? Why?
Maybe it has something to do with this thing next to the door...
It looks like some sort of card reader.
A card reader?
Oh! I saw those by the doors upstairs, too!
They must work like locks...
If it is a lock, then how do we unlock it?
This one has a red light on it, what did the others look like?
I remember!
The one by the door that led back to the hall with the rooms had a light too, but it looked like it was off.
And we didn't have any trouble going through those doors...
So no light means it's unlocked!
If no light means it's unlocked...
Then a red light must mean we need a keycard to open it!
But where would we get a keycard?
Maybe there's one around here somewhere...
Let's try looking around on this floor!
What do you mean?
I'm sure there's one around here somewhere! Let's just try looking around.
Is it really okay to just look around this place? What if someone catches us?
Then maybe they could open this door! It'll be fine.
I guess if you're okay with it too, {character_name}...

Interact_Lobby_Door_Find-Keycard.Text: We need to find a keycard to open it. Maybe there's one around here somewhere...

default.Text: There's a gate blocking these stairs.

&Chapter1!Interact_Foyer-1_Gate.Text: It looks like there's a gate blocking these stairs.
Maybe that side is under construction?
I don't know, I feel like if it were under construction there'd be signs or something.
Or at least someone else around.

Office-Hall_Leave_Restroom.Text: uhh.... you gonna go in ther?

Chapter1!Enter_Office.Text: I still feel like we shouldn't be doing this...
I haven't seen anybody around, I'm sure it's fine!

Foyer-1_Leave_Door.Text: We're going to the lobby to find out what's going on!

Foyer-1_Leave_Keycard.Text: I didn't see anything that looked like a keycard up there.
Maybe we could try looking in those offices over there?

default.Text: That door over there says "Offices" above it.

Chapter1:Find_Keycard.Text: The red is totally the same color, and the key picture matches too!

default.Text: Maybe there's something in the trash can..?

Chapter1!Presence_Rosemary_Offices_Searc.Text: There's not much in any of these offices, is there?
Let's just try looking in every single drawer!
There has to be something around here somewhere...
I guess we can just try looking in some of those drawers?

Chapter1:Find_Keycard.Text: I don't think there's going to be much else in any of these offices.
So let's go unlock that door!

default.Text: I don't really want to look under everything in here...
Do you think someone would really just leave a keycard lying around?

Chapter1:Find_Keycard.Text: Let's just get out of here.
I don't want to do any more snooping around.

default.Text: I don't think anyone has been here for a while...

Chapter1!Presence_Simon_Offices_Searchin.Text: These offices all seem pretty cleaned out...
I don't think we have time to look in every drawer...
I really hope nobody walks in on us...

Chapter1:Find_Keycard.Text: I guess that's all we're going to find here.
Maybe we'll get some answers if we go to the lobby.

default.Text: I don't really want to look under every thing in here...

Find_Keycard.Text: I didn't think we'd find anything...
At least, I hope that's the right one...
It has a picture of a key on it and it's colored red, so I'm guessing that means it's for the red locks.
Alright, one step closer to figuring out what's going on!
